Control.ttp: itThis page provides information related to Security Settings.
itThe username used for logging into the PAC.
itWhen checked, indicates no password is required for this user to login to the PAC.
itThe password used for logging into the PAC.
itThe password used for logging into the PAC. (Must match the password entered above.)
itWhen checkmarked, indicates that this user is currently enabled.
itDate and time this user was first added to the database.
itDate and time of the last modifications made to this user.
itLevel of access granted to this user.
itClick to display online help related to this page...
itClick to begin adding a new user...
itClick to indicate the selected user should be removed...
itClick to save the current user information to the database...
itClick to refresh the contents of this page...
itClick to collapse all the groups in the grid...
itClick to expand all the groups in the grid...
itThe username used for logging into the PAC
itIndicates the level of access granted to this user.
itThe date and time the user was added to the database.
itThe date and time of the last modification.
itIndicates whether the user is currently enabled or not.
itThe date and time the user last accessed the database via the corresponding IP Address.
itThe IP Address(es) the user accessed the database from.

Messages.Message: itPassword must be at least {0} characters in length.
itNew Password and Confirm Password must match.
itUsername must be at least {0} characters in length.
